message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.ctrip.apollo.core.exception.BadRequestException' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ExceptionHandler'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.ctrip.apollo.core.exception.NotFoundException' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ExceptionHandler'.
Import statement for 'org.springframework.http.HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Import statement for 'org.springframework.http.HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Import statement for 'org.springframework.http.HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Import statement for 'org.springframework.http.MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
WhitespaceAround: '{' is not preceded with whitespace.
